sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, ShoppingBag, Heart, MessageCircle, Settings, Star, MapPin, Phone, Mail, Eye, Calendar, Package, CreditCard, Award, TrendingUp, ArrowUp, Store, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; const UserProfile = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [showUpgradeModal, setShowUpgradeModal] = useState(false); // Mock user data - in real app this would come from API/auth context const userData = { id: 'user_123', firstName: 'John', lastName: 'Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', phone: '+1 (555) 123-4567', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face', location: { city: 'New York', state: 'NY', country: 'USA' }, accountType: 'buyer', // 'buyer' or 'seller' stats: { totalPurchases: 12, totalSpent: 850, favoriteItems: 23, reviewsGiven: 8, rating: 4.6, // as a buyer reviewCount: 5 }, joinedDate: '2023-06-15', membershipLevel: 'Silver', // Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum isVerified: true }; const buyerTabConfig = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: User }, { id: 'purchases', label: 'My Orders', icon: ShoppingBag }, { id: 'favorites', label: 'Wishlist', icon: Heart }, { id: 'messages', label: 'Messages', icon: MessageCircle }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: Settings } ]; const statsCards = [ { title: 'Total Orders', value: userData.stats.totalPurchases, icon: ShoppingBag, color: 'blue' }, { title: 'Total Spent', value: userData.stats.totalSpent, icon: CreditCard, color: 'green', prefix: '$' }, { title: 'Wishlist Items', value: userData.stats.favoriteItems, icon: Heart, color: 'red' }, { title: 'Reviews Given', value: userData.stats.reviewsGiven, icon: Star, color: 'yellow' } ]; const handleUpgradeToSeller = () => { setShowUpgradeModal(true); }; return (
{/* Header */}

My Profile

{userData.location.city}, {userData.location.state} {userData.membershipLevel} Member Joined {new Date(userData.joinedDate).toLocaleDateString()} {userData.isVerified && ( ✓ Verified )}
{/* Upgrade to Seller Button */}
{/* Upgrade Banner */}

Ready to start selling?

Turn your items into cash! Upgrade to a seller account and start listing products today.

{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{buyerTabConfig.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Content */}
{activeTab === 'overview' && ( )} {activeTab === 'purchases' && ( )} {activeTab === 'favorites' && ( )} {activeTab === 'messages' && ( )} {activeTab === 'settings' && ( )}
{/* Upgrade Modal */} {showUpgradeModal && ( setShowUpgradeModal(false)} /> )}
); }; // Overview Tab Component (Buyer-focused) const OverviewTab = ({ statsCards, userData, onUpgrade }) => (
{/* Stats Cards */}

); // Purchases Tab (Enhanced for buyers) const PurchasesTab = ({ userId }) => { const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all'); return (
{/* Filters */}

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(i => (

); }; // Favorites/Wishlist Tab const FavoritesTab = ({ userId }) => (

); // Settings Tab (same as before) const SettingsTab = ({ userData }) => (

); export default UserProfile;
